### 0.3.1 (2019-04-25)

  * Add explicit dependency on `bigarray`

### 0.3.0 (2018-04-18)

  * Extensive additions to BGP parsing support from @jimyuan1995

### 0.2.0 (2017-10-27)

  * Upgrade to use `jbuilder`, modern `opam`, `topkg`, etc
  * Fix warnings, generally tidy things up

### 0.1.1 (2015-11-21)

  * Initial release
